channel.title: How to make runescape not laggy
channel.description: Ok so i got a new laptop for christmas and when i try to play rs its really laggy i have the lowest hd all the details ether off or low and i get on very small worlds with rarely no one on but yet i still lagg... Any way of fixing this? I even turned off some programs.

item.title: How to make runescape not laggy
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

It’s not possible, Jagex is impossibru

Read full topic

item.title: How to make runescape not laggy
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

HcoJustin:

Chances are it has one of Intel’s shit integrated cards… They aren’t good for much more than browsing the web

^^True on that

Read full topic
item.source: How to make runescape not laggy

item.title: How to make runescape not laggy
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:6, topic:442264”]RuneScape is just a fucked up game, they are to shit to fix anything, it’s most likely NOT your laptop.
I used to play RuneScape smoothly to on my laptop, but after bot-nuking, it never runned smoothly anymore, even after the performance update.
But, if you can try switching to DirectX or openGL, use GameBooster, and if you have an Intel graphics card, use GMABooster(if it even works).
You could also try to set ‘java.exe’ (or JagexLauncher.exe on rs client) to a high priority
Or give java/rsclient more memory.[/quote]
They fixed it, I get 40-45 fps on the highest detail setting in full-screen again.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make runescape not laggy

item.title: How to make runescape not laggy
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

In ALL honesty. If you wish to play RuneScape smoothly download Ubuntu and play with it. I have found Ubuntu plays RuneScape much much more smoothly than Windows does these days.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make runescape not laggy

item.title: How to make runescape not laggy
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

RuneScape is just a fucked up game, they are to shit to fix anything, it’s most likely NOT your laptop.
I used to play RuneScape smoothly to on my laptop, but after bot-nuking, it never runned smoothly anymore, even after the performance update.
But, if you can try switching to DirectX or openGL, use GameBooster, and if you have an Intel graphics card, use GMABooster(if it even works).
You could also try to set ‘java.exe’ (or JagexLauncher.exe on rs client) to a high priority
Or give java/rsclient more memory.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make runescape not laggy

item.source: How to make runescape not laggy

item.title: How to make runescape not laggy
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

RuneScape really doesn’t require much power to get decent performance. A new laptop should run it fine regardless of your card/gpu - After their most recent engine upgrade, even my older desktop nears 50fps in low detail with a gpu, no card

Are you using software, opengl, or directx? Type “displayfps” in the developers console(open it by pressing `) and compare the framerates you get using each one. Usually, one will work a bit better than the other two

Read full topic
item.source: How to make runescape not laggy
